com.rockhoppertech.music

Class Pattern.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.Pattern.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Pattern

    public static class Pattern.Builder
extends Object
    Bloch's pattern and not the GoF pattern. Pattern pattern = new Pattern.Builder(chord.getPitchClasses(),someInts).build(); or even 
     Pattern pattern = new Pattern.Builder(chord.getPitchClasses(), someInts)
         .startPitch(C5).numOctaves(3).duration(Q)
         .reverse(false).restBetweenPatterns(0).upAndDown(false)
         .build();
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa
